meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jennifer Morgan Prabhu Balasubramanian Stephanie Fontaine Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6417.

td.p: Jennifer Morgan, a stay-at-home mom from Norcross, Georgia
Prabhu Balasubramanian, a product manager from Mountain View, California
Stephanie Fontaine, an analyst from Arlington, Virginia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $54,500)

tr.td: CHAIRMEN OF THE FEDERAL RESERVE
AT THE BEACH
ILLINOIS STATE SYMBOLS
FACTS ABOUT AUTHORS
NO. 1 IN THE NFL DRAFT
(Alex: You have to tell us which team drafted that individual No. 1.)
"PIC" ME!

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Before he became chairman in 1979, Paul Volcker appropriately worked as an undersecretary of this cabinet dept.')
